entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist mentioned in the conversation between Snape and Filch. He is described as being unable to enter Snape's office.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a professor who is having a conversation with Filch about an egg that was found in his office.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a character who is having a conversation with Snape about the egg and Peeves.

entities.name: egg
entities.description: An egg that was found in Snape's office and thrown by Peeves.

relationships.description: Snape and Filch are having a conversation about the egg and Peeves.
Peeves threw the egg, according to Filch.
Snape has an office where the torches were lit and a cupboard door was ajar.
